sqlMap.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
OFFICE_CD LIKE #searchOffice# ||'%'
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_CD officeCd, USER_ID userId, USER_NM userNm, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrSttusCode, (select REGULAR_TYPE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) regularType, (SELECT OFFICE_SORT_IX FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID AND OFFICE_CD = A.OFFICE_CD ) officesortix, case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) when 4 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 3 then
( select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 2 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) end as officeNms, (SELECT OFFICE_DP FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID AND OFFICE_CD = A.OFFICE_CD ) officeDp, OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, REGISTER_DATE register_dt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
OFFICE_CD LIKE #searchOffice# || '%'
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT count(*) as cnt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTCOFFICE B ON A.OFFICE_CD = B.OFFICE_CD where 1=1 and A.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE ='1' and A.USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND B.OFFICE_IS_USE = 1
A.OFFICE_CD LIKE #officeCd# || '%'
A.OFFICE_CD =''
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT A.OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, A.OFFICE_CD officeCd, ( (SELECT TO_NUMBER(OFFICE_DP || '0000') + TO_NUMBER(OFFICE_SORT_IX) FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE A.OFFICE_CD=OFFICE_CD) || A.OFFICE_CD) officeRank, A.USER_ID userId, A.USER_NM userNm, A.OFFICE_TEL officeTel, A.OFFICE_FAX officeFax, A.OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, A.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrSttusCode, (select REGULAR_TYPE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) regularType, case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) when 4 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 3 then
( select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 2 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) end as officeNms, A.OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, A.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, A.REGISTER_DATE register_dt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTCOFFICE B ON A.OFFICE_CD = B.OFFICE_CD where 1=1 and A.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE ='1' and A.USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND B.OFFICE_IS_USE = 1
A.OFFICE_CD LIKE #officeCd# || '%'
A.OFFICE_CD =''
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY officeRank ASC, A.OFFICE_PT_IX ASC
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART ( OFFICE_PT_SID, SGROUP_ID, USER_NM, OFFICE_CD, USER_ID, OFFICE_TEL, OFFICE_FAX, OFFICE_PT_IX, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE, OFFICE_PT_MEMO, MODIFY_DATE, REGISTER_DATE ) VALUES ( #officePtSid#, #sgroupId#,
#userNm#,
#emplyrNm#,
#officeCd#, #userId#, #officeTel#, #officeFax#, #officePtIx#, #officePtIsUse#, #officePtMemo#, #modify_dt#, #register_dt# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_CD officeCd, USER_ID userId, USER_NM userNm, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneFrist, (select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneMiddle, (select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneEnd, (select USER_AUTH_CODE From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)userAuthCode, (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) as officeNms, OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, REGISTER_DATE register_dt, '1' as etc
FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A WHERE OFFICE_PT_SID = $officePtSid$

SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_CD officeCd, USER_ID userId, USER_NM userNm, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneFrist, (select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneMiddle, (select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneEnd, (select USER_AUTH_CODE From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)userAuthCode, '' as officeNms, OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, REGISTER_DATE register_dt, $viewcode$ etc FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A WHERE 1=1
OFFICE_TEL = #officeTel#
OFFICE_CD = #officeCd#

SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_CD officeCd, USER_ID userId, USER_NM userNm, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrSttusCode, (select REGULAR_TYPE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) regularType, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) when 4 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 3 then
( select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 2 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) end as officeNms, OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, REGISTER_DATE register_dt
FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET OFFICE_CD=#officeCd#, USER_ID =#userId#,
USER_NM = #emplyrNm#,
OFFICE_TEL=#officeTel#, OFFICE_FAX=#officeFax#, OFFICE_PT_IX= #officePtIx#, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE=#officePtIsUse#, OFFICE_PT_MEMO= #officePtMemo#, MODIFY_DATE=#modify_dt# WHERE OFFICE_PT_SID = #officePtSid#
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET OFFICE_TEL=#officeTel#, OFFICE_FAX=#officeFax#, OFFICE_PT_IX= #officePtIx# WHERE OFFICE_PT_SID = #officePtSid#

UPDATE RFC_COMTNMANAGER SET ORGNZT_ID=#officeCd#,
EMAIL_ADRES=SCP.ENC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,#emailAdres#),
EMAIL_ADRES=#emailAdres#,
OFCPS_NM =#ofcpsNm# WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #userId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET
OFFICE_TEL=#officeTel#,
OFFICE_FAX=#officeFax#,
OFFICE_PT_MEMO= #officePtMemo#,
OFFICE_PT_IX=#officePtIx#,
OFFICE_CD=#officeCd# WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET OFFICE_CD=#moveOfficeCd# WHERE OFFICE_CD=#officeCd#
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET USER_ID ='' WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET OFFICE_PT_IX= #officePtIx# WHERE OFFICE_PT_SID = #officePtSid#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, PART.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, PART.USER_NM userNm, PART.OFFICE_CD officeCd, PART.USER_ID userId, PART.OFFICE_TEL officeTel, PART.OFFICE_FAX officeFax, PART.OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, PART.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, PART.OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, PART.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, PART.REGISTER_DATE register_dt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART PART INNER JOIN RFC_COMTCOFFICE OFFICE ON PART.OFFICE_CD = OFFICE.OFFICE_CD WHERE OFFICE_PT_IS_USE = 1 AND OFFICE.OFFICE_IS_USE = 1 AND ( 1=0
PART.USER_NM LIKE '%$userNm$%'
PART.OFFICE_PT_MEMO LIKE '%$officePtMemo$%'
PART.OFFICE_TEL LIKE '%$officeTel$%'
PART.OFFICE_FAX LIKE '%$officeFax$%'
) AND PART.SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId# ORDER BY OFFICE_SORT_IX ASC, OFFICE_PT_IX ASC

SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_CD officeCd, USER_ID userId, USER_NM userNm, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (SELECT OFFICE_SORT_IX FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID AND OFFICE_CD = A.OFFICE_CD ) officesortix, (select USER_AUTH_CODE From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)userAuthCode,
ECL_DECRYPT(select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneFrist, ECL_DECRYPT(select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneMiddle, ECL_DECRYPT(select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneEnd,
(select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneFrist, (select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneMiddle, (select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneEnd,
SCP.DEC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, SCP.DEC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneFrist, SCP.DEC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneMiddle, SCP.DEC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneEnd,
(select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneFrist, (select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneMiddle, (select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneEnd,
case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) when 4 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 3 then
( select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 2 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) end as officeNms, OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo
FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
OFFICE_CD LIKE '$searchOffice$%'
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
USER_NM = #userNm#
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$

SELECT A.OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, A.OFFICE_CD officeCd, A.USER_ID userId, A.USER_NM userNm, A.OFFICE_TEL officeTel, A.OFFICE_FAX officeFax, A.OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, A.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (SELECT OFFICE_SORT_IX FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID AND OFFICE_CD = A.OFFICE_CD ) officesortix, (select USER_AUTH_CODE From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)userAuthCode,
ECL_DECRYPT(select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneFrist, ECL_DECRYPT(select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneMiddle, ECL_DECRYPT(select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneEnd,
(select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneFrist, (select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneMiddle, (select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneEnd,
SCP.DEC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, SCP.DEC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneFrist, SCP.DEC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneMiddle, SCP.DEC_STR(#damoUser#,'RFC_COMTNMANAGER',#damoKey#,select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneEnd,
(select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneFrist, (select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneMiddle, (select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) phoneEnd,
A.OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, (SELECT OFFICE_DP FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID AND OFFICE_CD = A.OFFICE_CD ) officeDp, B.OFFICE_NM officeNms FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTCOFFICE B ON A.OFFICE_CD = B.OFFICE_CD WHERE A.OFFICE_CD LIKE '$officeDomain$%'
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$

SELECT A.OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, A.OFFICE_CD officeCd, A.USER_ID userId, A.USER_NM userId, A.OFFICE_TEL officeTel, A.OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, A.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, B.MENU_CD menuCd, B.MENU_NM menuNm, A.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, A.REGISTER_DATE register_dt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTNMENU B ON A.OFFICE_PT_SID = B.OFFICE_PT_SID WHERE USER_ID = #userId#

SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_CD officeCd, USER_ID userId, USER_NM userNm, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrSttusCode, (select REGULAR_TYPE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) regularType, (SELECT OFFICE_SORT_IX FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID AND OFFICE_CD = A.OFFICE_CD ) officesortix, case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) when 4 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 3 then
( select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 2 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) end as officeNms, (SELECT OFFICE_DP FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE SGROUP_ID = A.SGROUP_ID AND OFFICE_CD = A.OFFICE_CD ) officeDp, OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, REGISTER_DATE register_dt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
OFFICE_CD LIKE '$searchOffice$%'
$searchOfficeCondition$ LIKE '$searchKeyword$'
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET OFFICE_CD=#officeCd#
WHERE USER_ID = #userId#

UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET
OFFICE_TEL=#officeTel#,
OFFICE_FAX=#officeFax#,
OFFICE_PT_MEMO= #officePtMemo#,
OFFICE_PT_IX=#officePtIx#
WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
SELECT A.OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, A.SGROUP_ID sgroupId, A.OFFICE_CD officeCd, A.USER_ID userId, A.USER_NM userNm, A.OFFICE_TEL officeTel, A.OFFICE_FAX officeFax, A.OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, A.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrSttusCode, (select REGULAR_TYPE FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) regularType, case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) when 4 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 3 then
( select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 2 then
(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.OFFICE_CD) end as officeNms, A.OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, A.MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, A.REGISTER_DATE register_dt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTCOFFICE B ON A.OFFICE_CD = B.OFFICE_CD where 1=1 and A.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE ='1' and A.USER_ID IS NOT NULL AND B.OFFICE_IS_USE = 1
A.OFFICE_CD LIKE '$officeCd$%'
A.OFFICE_CD =''
ORDER BY A.USER_NM ASC
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT EMINWONPART_IDS eminwonPartIds ,EMINWONPART_USERID eminwonPartUserID ,EMINWONPART_DEPTID eminwonPartDeptid ,EMINWONPART_NAME eminwonPartName ,EMINWONPART_STATUS eminwonPartStatus ,EMINWONPART_SEQ eminwonPartSeq ,EMINWONPART_PHONE eminwonPartPhone ,EMINWONPART_FAX eminwonPartFax ,EMINWONPART_EMAIL eminwonPartEmail ,EMINWONPART_BUSINESS eminwonPartBusiness ,EMINWONPART_DUTYNAME eminwonPartDutyName ,EMINWONPART_WORKCODE eminwonPartWorkCode ,EMINWONPART_WORKNM eminwonPartWorkNm ,EMINWONPART_ENGMSE eminwonPartEngmSe ,EMINWONPART_HP eminwonPartHp FROM RFC_COMTNEMINWONPART WHERE EMINWONPART_DEPTID LIKE '$officeRealCode$%'

SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_CD officeCd, USER_ID userId, USER_NM userNm, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneFrist, (select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneMiddle, (select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneEnd, (select USER_AUTH_CODE From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)userAuthCode, '' as officeNms, OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, REGISTER_DATE register_dt
FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A WHERE USER_ID = #userId# AND USER_NM = #userNm#
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART SET SGROUP_ID=#sgroupId#, USER_ID =#userId#, USER_NM = #userNm#, OFFICE_TEL=#officeTel#, OFFICE_FAX=#officeFax#, OFFICE_PT_IX= #officePtIx#, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE=#officePtIsUse#, OFFICE_PT_MEMO= #officePtMemo#, MODIFY_DATE=#modify_dt# WHERE 1=1 AND
OFFICE_CD = #officeCd#
OFFICE_PT_SID = #officePtSid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT EMINWONPART_IDS eminwonPartIds ,EMINWONPART_USERID eminwonPartUserID ,EMINWONPART_DEPTID eminwonPartDeptid ,EMINWONPART_NAME eminwonPartName ,EMINWONPART_STATUS eminwonPartStatus ,EMINWONPART_SEQ eminwonPartSeq ,EMINWONPART_PHONE eminwonPartPhone ,EMINWONPART_FAX eminwonPartFax ,EMINWONPART_EMAIL eminwonPartEmail ,EMINWONPART_BUSINESS eminwonPartBusiness ,EMINWONPART_DUTYNAME eminwonPartDutyName ,EMINWONPART_WORKCODE eminwonPartWorkCode ,EMINWONPART_WORKNM eminwonPartWorkNm ,EMINWONPART_ENGMSE eminwonPartEngmSe ,EMINWONPART_HP eminwonPartHp FROM RFC_COMTNEMINWONPART WHERE EMINWONPART_DEPTID = '$officeRealCode$'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM (
select T1.OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid ,T3.PATH officeNms ,T3.rootOfficeCd ,T3.OFFICE_CD officeCd ,T1.USER_ID userId ,T3.OFFICE_SORT_IX officesortix ,rootOfficeSordIx ,T1.OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx ,T2.EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm ,T2.EMPLYR_ID ,T2.MOBLFRIST_NO ,T2.MOBLMIDDLE_NO ,T2.MOBLEND_NO ,T1.USER_NM userNm ,T1.OFFICE_TEL officeTel ,T1.OFFICE_FAX officeFax ,T1.OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo ,T2.EMAIL_ADRES emailAdres ,T2.OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm ,T2.USER_AUTH_CODE ,T1.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse ,T1.SGROUP_ID sgroupId from ( SELECT CONNECT_BY_ROOT OFFICE_CD as rootOfficeCd, CONNECT_BY_ROOT OFFICE_SORT_IX as rootOfficeSordIx, OFFICE_SORT_IX,LEVEL,OFFICE_NM, OFFICE_CD,OFFICE_DP, SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(OFFICE_NM, '>'), 1) PATH FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE WHERE OFFICE_IS_USE = 1 START WITH OFFICE_DP = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR OFFICE_CD = OFFICE_PARENT_CD order by OFFICE_CD asc ) T3 inner join RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART T1 on T1.OFFICE_CD=T3.OFFICE_CD inner join RFC_COMTNMANAGER T2 on T1.USER_ID=T2.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1=1 and T1.OFFICE_PT_IS_USE ='1' and T1.USER_ID IS NOT NULL
T1.SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
USER_NM LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%' OR T1.OFFICE_TEL LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%' OR T1.OFFICE_PT_MEMO LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
T1.USER_ID NOT IN ($disableOfficePart$)
order by rootOfficeSordIx,OFFICE_DP,OFFICE_SORT_IX,OFFICE_PT_IX ASC ) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART
WHERE 1=1 and OFFICE_PT_IS_USE ='1' and USER_ID IS NOT NULL
SGROUP_ID = #sgroupId#
USER_NM LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%' OR OFFICE_TEL LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%' OR OFFICE_PT_MEMO LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
USER_ID NOT IN ($disableOfficePart$)

SELECT OFFICE_PT_SID officePtSid, SGROUP_ID sgroupId, OFFICE_CD officeCd, USER_ID userId, USER_NM userNm, OFFICE_TEL officeTel, OFFICE_FAX officeFax, OFFICE_PT_IX officePtIx, OFFICE_PT_IS_USE officePtIsUse, (select OFCPS_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) ofcpsNm, (select ORGNZT_ID FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) orgnztId, (select EMPLYR_NM FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emplyrNm, (select EMAIL_ADRES FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID) emailAdres, (select MOBLFRIST_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneFrist, (select MOBLMIDDLE_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneMiddle, (select MOBLEND_NO From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)phoneEnd, (select USER_AUTH_CODE From RFC_COMTNMANAGER WHERE EMPLYR_ID = A.USER_ID)userAuthCode, '' as officeNms, OFFICE_PT_MEMO officePtMemo, MODIFY_DATE modify_dt, REGISTER_DATE register_dt
FROM RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART A WHERE USER_ID = #userId#
